title: All 4 stars are for the slim waists of luv And Joi

title: Watch it
review: I am not a cartoon/animation/anime fan or knowledgeable person, but this one was beautiful and also exotic for a non-Japanese like myself.I hope the success of this feature length doesn't inspire the greedy Hollywood types to assault it like some reviewers are predicting.

title: The People not Liking This Must Be Chubsters From Mississipi
review: Because the Korean girl is Nature' gift to Man. Around here there are no thin women left. They all got tattoos and either shaved their head or dyed it orange so they can distract from the thunder thighs.Train to Busan (A City in South Korea) is action packed, rapid, violent, high budget and wow is the chick nubile and tasty.

title: It's A Thugs Life
review: Who cast this guy? I bet he is a WWE or MMA loser with the brain damage that goes with it.How pathetic.No wonder the film repelled me. Aquaman is an arbiter of justice not a Duck Dynasty extra.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time in America
title: At Least There Are A Couple Of Natural And Love Making Scenes
review:
Otherwise it would be a straight 0/10.
It's a slow albeit careless movie. There's no education, no story, and worse character depth and development than most movies. I shed a lot of patience throughout the movie trying to stay awake and was helped by a couple of semi-nudity scenes. There's no real heart and no real heartbreak. Everyone should stay away from it.
